languages.text: "Надеюсь, это не приведет к новым, еще более серьезным проблемам. Эх, рискуем!"
"I hope this gamble doesn't cause even more serious problems."
languages.original_text: "Надеюсь, это не приведет к новым, еще более серьезным проблемам. Эх, рискуем!"

traits.locale_text: "I hope this will not beget any more serious problems. Let us take our chance!"
"I hope this will not beget any more serious problems. Let us take our chance!"
"I hope this gamble doesn't cause even more serious problems."
"I hope this will not beget more serious problems. Let us take our chances!"
"I hope this will not beget more serious problems. Let us take our chances!"
"I hope this gamble doesn't cause even more serious problems."

"I hope this gamble doesn't cause even more serious problems."

languages.text: “希望这场豪赌不会惹出更麻烦的问题。”
languages.original_text: "I hope this gamble doesn't cause even more serious problems."

traits.locale_text: “希望这场豪赌不会惹出更麻烦的问题。”

languages.text: «Espero que esta apuesta no cause problemas aún mayores».
languages.original_text: "I hope this gamble doesn't cause even more serious problems."

traits.locale_text: «Espero que esta apuesta no cause problemas aún mayores».

languages.text: 「これ以上深刻な問題を引き起こさないといいのですが」
languages.original_text: "I hope this gamble doesn't cause even more serious problems."

traits.locale_text: 「これ以上深刻な問題を引き起こさないといいのですが。さあ、チャンスをものにしましょう！」

languages.text: « J'espère que ce pari n'occasionnera pas de problèmes plus graves encore. »
languages.original_text: "I hope this gamble doesn't cause even more serious problems."

traits.locale_text: « J'espère que ce pari n'occasionnera pas de problèmes plus graves encore. »

languages.text: "Ich hoffe, dieses Spiel führt nicht zu noch ernsteren Problemen."
languages.original_text: "I hope this gamble doesn't cause even more serious problems."

traits.locale_text: "Ich hoffe, dieses Spiel führt nicht zu noch ernsteren Problemen."

languages.text: "Umuyorum bu kumar, çok daha ciddi sorunlara sebep olmaz."
languages.original_text: "I hope this gamble doesn't cause even more serious problems."

traits.locale_text: "Umuyorum bu kumar, çok daha ciddi sorunlara sebep olmaz."
